00029 Options::Options() { 
00030     m_Options.resize(1);
00031     m_Labels["current"] = 0;

00039 void Options::getOptionNames(std::vector<std::string> &names, int oI){ 
00040     for(int i=0; i < m_Options[oI].m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00041         names.push_back(m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_longName);
00042     }
00043 }

00045 void Options::getOptionTypes(std::vector<PgOpt::PgOptType> &types, int oI) {
00046     for(int i=0; i < m_Options[oI].m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00047         types.push_back(m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_type);
00048     }

00056 bool Options::isOptDefined(const std::string& name, int oI) 
00057 {
00058   return (m_Options[0].findOpt(name) != NULL);
00059 }
00060 
00067 void Options::setOpt(const std::string &name, const std::string& value) {
00068         if (!m_Options[0].isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00069         m_Options[0].set(name, value);
00070   //Verbose::out(1,"Set string option " + name + " to " + value);
00071 } 
00072 
00079 void Options::setOpt(const std::string &name, std::vector< std::string > & values) {
00080   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {
00081     Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");
00082   }
00083   if (values.size() != 0) {
00084     if (m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->m_allowMultiple)
00085     {
00086             m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->m_values = values;
00087     }
00088     else
00089     {
00090             if (values.size() > 1) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " does not allow multiple values.");}
00091             if (values.size() == 1) {setOpt(name, values[0]);}
00092     }
00093   }
00094 }
00095   
00102 void Options::setOpt(const std::string & name, std::vector< std::vector<std::string> > & values ) {
00104   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00105   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->setValue(ToStr(values.size()));
00106   for ( int i =0; i < values.size(); i++ ) {
00107     pushOpt(name, values[i]);
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00117 void Options::pushOpt( const std::string &name, const std::string & value ) {
00118   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00119   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->pushValue(value);
00120 }
00121 
00128 void Options::pushOpt ( const std::string & name, std::vector< std::string > values ) {
00129   if (!isOptDefined(name)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00131   int nextRow = 0;
00132   
00133   while ( m_Options[0].findOpt( name + "::" + ToStr( nextRow )) != NULL ) {
00134     nextRow++;
00135   }
00136   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt(name)->setValue(ToStr(nextRow + 1));
00137   defOptMult("", name + "::" + ToStr(nextRow),PgOpt::STRING_OPT,"","");
00138   m_Options[0].mustFindOpt( name + "::" + ToStr(nextRow))->m_values = values;
00139 }

00146 int Options::parseArgv( const char * const * const argv, int start ) {
00147   return m_Options[0].parseArgv( argv, start );
00148 }

00155 std::string Options::getOpt(const std::string& name, int oI) {
00156   if (!isOptDefined(name, oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00157   return m_Options[oI].get( name );
00158 }
00159 
00165 bool Options::getOptBool(const std::string& name, int oI) {
00166   if (!isOptDefined(name,oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00167   if ((getOpt(name,oI) != "true") && (getOpt(name,oI) != "false") && (getOpt(name,oI) != ""))
00168   {
00169           Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " must be set to either true or false.");
00170   }
00171   return m_Options[oI].getBool(name );
00172 }

00181   return m_Options[oI].getInt(name);

00190   if (!isOptDefined(name,oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options for this engine.");}
00191   return m_Options[oI].getDouble(name);

00199 std::vector< std::string >& Options::getOptVector (const std::string &name, int oI) {
00200     if (!isOptDefined(name,oI)) {Err::errAbort("Option " + name + " cannot be found in the options snapshot for this engine.");}
00201     return m_Options[oI].mustFindOpt( name )->m_values;
00202 }

00218   
00219 void Options::printOptions(const std::string &prefix, int oI) {
00220   // Spit out to the log the options
00222   for(int i=0; i<m_Options[oI].m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00223     std::string name = m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_longName;
00224     std::string vals;
00225     if(m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size() > 0) {
00226       vals =  "'" + m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values[0] + "'";
00227       for(int j=1; j< m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size(); j++)
00228         vals += ", '" + m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->m_values[j] + "'";
00229     }
00230     else {vals = "'" + m_Options[oI].m_option_vec[i]->getValue() + "'";}
00231     Verbose::out(2,prefix + "Option '" + name + "' = " + vals);
00232   }
00233 }
